pages.title: Desolation
pages.text: Emptiness fills this place, a feeling of

unending depression fills the heart in my vessel as I tread here, the realm breaths ever so softly and hums a rather sad hymn of it's sorrowful past, and although I am unable to decipher what had happened here, I still feel the way of empathy for this realm and who may have been casted here. $(br)$(br) Beside the hard to shake emotions that swell in my mind and soul, the area is rich with powerful resources I'd be damned not to grab while here.
